content:
Related Search Methods

  • Beam Search

    • Keep k best instead of single best
    • Requires evaluationGenetic Algorithms
    • Keep k hypotheses per generation
    • Allow hypotheses to “breed” stochastically

  • Simulated Annealing

    • Apply operatorsGradient Descent
    • Requires differentiable functions
